snippet: The concerts will take place in the 260-seat Anspracher Theater from Sept. 25 through Oct. 9, a tiny space for the former front man of the Police, who can easily fill arenas.
abstract: The concerts will take place in the 260-seat Anspracher Theater from Sept. 25 through Oct. 9, a tiny space for the former front man of the Police, who can easily fill arenas.

headline.main: Sting to Perform Benefit Shows for Public Theater This Fall
headline.print_headline: Sting to Perform Benefits For Public Theater
